医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
与长期开发有关的铁失调新研究发现，由于SARS-COV-2感染，血液中铁水平的问题以及人体调节这种重要养分的能力可能是长期兴奋的关键触发因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/iron-dysregulation-linked-to-long-covid-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/iron-dysregulation-linked-to-long-covid-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E5BEA20-25BB-4528-A267-A267-A6F1DDCB45A1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 09:14:59 -0500 Iron dysregulation linked to long COVID development
对糖尿病心肌病免疫调节中miRNA角色的新见解宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。糖尿病心肌病（DCM）是一种独立的糖尿病并发症，其特征在于心肌结构，功能和代谢异常，包括心肌收缩性降低，心肌肥大和纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-insights-into-mirna-roles-in-diabetic-cardionyopathy-mimmune-renculation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-insights-into-mirna-roles-in-diabetic-cardionyopathy-mmmune-renculation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8327E2A4-D91A-429D-90DC-CC2B1D0AC43E Wed, 05 Mar 2025 08:37:36 -0500 New insights into miRNA roles in diabetic cardiomyopathy immune regulation
Vapourtec公布高温挤满了床反应堆专业流动化学公司Vapourtec最近推出了高温包装的床反应堆，该反应堆将为许多新型的反应打开“激动人心的机会”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/vapourtec-unveils-high-temperature-temperature-packed-bed-reactor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/vapourtec-unveils-high-temperature-packed-bed-reactor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A3F1FFA0-8EBB-42F6-93B0-342666362F956 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 07:25:00 -0500
儿童的身体形象感知从七岁开始形成根据达勒姆大学（英国）的新研究，我们对身体形象的看法是由我们早在七岁的时候就塑造的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/childrens-body-image-image-ceptions-begin-begin-to-form-at-age-age-seven.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/childrens-body-image-image-ceptions-begin-begin-to-form-at-age-age-seven.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fd0dace-dcb-4bf9-a00b-8c277999da8e26 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 06:49:32 -0500 Children's body image perceptions begin to form at age seven
长期NSAID使用与降低痴呆症风险有关的使用过去的研究表明，炎症可能有助于痴呆的发展和进展，而非甾体类抗炎（NSAID）药物可能由于其抗炎作用而有助于预防痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/long-term-nsaid-use-link-link-to-lower-to-lower-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/long-term-nsaid-use-link-link-link-lown-to-lower-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A93552B8-B69C-4E30-B72F-B661E6A3C0EC Wed, 05 Mar 2025 06:41:38 -0500 Long-term NSAID use linked to lower dementia risk
童年时期的时机与以后的焦虑相关研究表明，在大脑发育期间面临逆境（例如创伤或压力事件）的年轻人，成年后患上焦虑症的可能性要高40％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/Childhood-Childhood-timing-timing-simed-with-with-risilience-to-resilience-to-anxierience-to-anxiety-to-anxiety-to-in-life-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/Childhood-Childhood-eversity-timing--simist-with-with-with-isilience-to-anclience-to-anxiety-to-anxierience-to-ancy-life-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f442e62-eba5-49c4-b572-b572-ba84b503f05f Wed, 05 Mar 2025 06:31:58 -0500 Childhood adversity timing associated with resilience to anxiety later in life
孕产妇吸烟和二手烟与增加的胎盘破裂风险有关与遗传学或年龄不同，吸烟是我们实际上可以做一些疾病的危险因素。通过戒烟，吸烟者可以最大程度地降低这些风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/maternal-smoking-and-second-hand-second-smoke-smoke-nink- incred-placeard-placeast-placeard-plactent-ruption-ruption-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/maternal-smoking-and-second-hand-hand-smoke-smoke-crink- increard-placeast-placeast-placeast-placeartion-ruption-ruption-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32C26185-5415-4785-91B7-A8DF47B2E5FA Wed, 05 Mar 2025 06:22:11 -0500 Maternal smoking and second-hand smoke linked to increased placental abruption risk
疾病预防控制中心的射击破坏了远远超出华盛顿的公共卫生工作特朗普政府突然解雇了全国范围内疾病控制和预防雇员的培训计划，他们的参与者加强了数十年来一直在资源饥饿的州和地方公共卫生部门的劳动力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/cdc-firings-undermine-public-health-work-work-far-beyond-beyond-washington.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/cdc-firings-undermine-public-health-work-work-far-beyond-beyond-washington.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be2CE8BD-F56F-412F-B511-61D952D73BB9 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 05:53:20 -0500 CDC firings undermine public health work far beyond Washington
慢性可卡因的使用增加了冲动性调查结果表明，慢性可卡因的使用改变了脑回路，在低冲动大鼠的冲动中增加了冲动性，与先前关于成瘾的假设相矛盾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/chronic-cocaine-use-increases-umplivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/chronic-cocaine-use-increases-umpulsitive.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93caac4f-6005-42cc-a382-18b3eba50cb6 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 05:25:00 -0500 Chronic cocaine use increases impulsivity
新的MS研究利用大脑的愈合能力一项新的多发性硬化症（MS）研究项目旨在通过激活自己的康复过程来帮助大脑修复，这是澳大利亚最新570万美元的研究投资的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-ms-research-harnessing-the-brains-healing-power.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-ms-research-harnessing-the-brains-healing-power.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=E06D88CA-DA84-47B2-A19C-83797FF21CB0 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 05:19:00 -0500 New MS research harnessing the brain's healing power
